work.title: Lead Developer
work.description1: Designed and implemented an instructor outreach system, achieving a 22% response rate by optimizing messaging, targeting strategies, and engagement tracking.
work.description2: Conducted AI-focused market research, analyzing industry trends and user behavior to inform business strategy and product direction.
work.description3: Analyzed large datasets on marketing performance and user engagement, using data-driven insights to refine ad performance, audience targeting, and customer acquisition strategies.

work.title: Data Analytics Intern
work.description1: Led end-to-end development of the Ventus mobile app MVP, from system architecture and rewards-matching logic to App Store deployment.
work.description2: Built and managed the tech stack with a React Native frontend, Node.js/Express backend, Supabase database, and secure authentication.
work.description3: Acted as technical lead, translating business goals into solutions while collaborating with founders and presenting in client meetings and investor pitches.
